name: The Museum Of Modern Art 2022.2 Brackeys Game Jam
name_original: The Museum Of Modern Art 2022.2 Brackeys Game Jam
description:
This is my submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 event. The theme for this event was "You are not alone". 

     You are a security guard working for the local modern art museum. Tonight you've been assigned night shift. Your job is to check on each piece of art in the building, marking it with a red tape. Once all the pieces are checked, you can leave.

     If you get worried throughout your shift, you can hold your flashlight up with right click. Of course, there's nothing to worry about, you are alone...
